name: Diagnosis Code 21 Present On Admission
description: The present on admission (POA) indicator code associated with the diagnosis codes (principal and secondary).

additional: eob.diagnosis[N].sequence = # selected by the code depending upon order of diagnosis'
fhirMapping.note: The POA code correlates to the diagnosis code based upon the number. Ie 'Diagnosis Code 3 Present on Admission' relates to 'Diagnosis Code 3'.
